original_text: Tobiah the Ammonite was beside him, and he said, “Yes, what they are building—if a fox goes up on it he will break down their stone wall!”
korean_text: 암몬 사람 도비야는 곁에 있다가 이르되 그들이 건축하는 돌 성벽은 여우가 올라가도 곧 무너지리라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Tobiah the Ammonite was beside him
sentences.korean_translation: 암몬 사람 도비야가 그 옆에 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: if a fox goes up on it
he will break down their stone wall!
